TitleEnglish: Level 1 Demon Lord and One Room Hero
SummaryEnglish: Ten years ago, the hero Max defeated the Demon Lord. In order to regain his power, the Demon Lord went into a deep slumber, but when he awakens, his body is only a chibi version of its fearsome form. Now curious to see what his enemy is up to, the Demon Lord visits Max, only to discover the mighty hero living in a dirty one-room apartment. The Demon Lord decides to move in with Max and help his old enemy become a formidable opponent once more!
Aliases: Lv1 Maō to One Room Yūsha
Lv1 Maou to One Room Yuusha

1.SummaryEnglish: The Demon Lord did not return after 10 years just to face a pathetic shell of a man who once called himself a hero. This insult shall not stand!

2.SummaryEnglish: What exactly does a retired hero do all day? The Demon Lord is on the case! But Zenia isn’t thrilled her boss is still traipsing around the world of humans…

3.SummaryEnglish: Max and Leo are no ordinary travelers. That’s fitting because they meet Fred, who is no ordinary cleric either!

4.SummaryEnglish: There’d be plenty of opportunities for Max if he joined the Demon Lord’s ranks: he could date monster girls and receive a generous benefits package! But does he want that?

5.SummaryEnglish: Max runs into an old acquaintance when he’s out shopping with the Demon Lord.

6.SummaryEnglish: Max and the Demon Lord witness a battle between the Kingdom and the Republic. But just as the Kingdom gains the advantage, Leo arrives to save the day!

7.SummaryEnglish: Zenia infiltrates the Bureau of Magic on the Demon Lord’s orders. She fancies herself an expert spy but…

8.SummaryEnglish: Someone caused the explosion that rocked the Bureau of Magic, but the question is, who? Max and the Demon Lord certainly have a lot of explaining to do…

9.SummaryEnglish: They were once allies, but now Fred and Leo find themselves on opposite sides as war brews between the Kingdom and the Republic.

10.SummaryEnglish: The last thing Max wants to do is get involved. But if he won't stop Fred and Leo from fighting, the Demon Lord will force him to.

11.SummaryEnglish: If Max wants to stop Fred and Leo, he'll need all the help he can get. Fortunately, an old friend prepared a backup.

12.SummaryEnglish: Max was a fallen hero, but his actions have paved the way to peace and the public loves a good redemption story. What does the future hold this time?
